data.name: Elderbug_All_Tasks_Done
data.value: You have done it! You learned about everything in this world! Well… almost. There still are some knowledge bits that are not receivable yet. They say, that it may be accessable once the event "Patch 2.1" happens. Whatever that might be. Anyway, this kingdom is now yours. I have nothing to offer you anymore. I might consider leaving this place now… There are still some places elsewhere that are full of knowledge.

data.name: Elderbug_Casual_Normal
data.value: In this version of Hallownest I've nothing left to offer to you. Good luck on your journey.

data.name: Elderbug_Casual_Rando
data.value: What an amusing twisted version of this land has been created. May you find your movement items early this run. Hehe...

data.name: Elderbug_Done_Task_1
data.value: Oh, I can sense the power that coursing through your shell. You managed to obtain a spell, congratulations. As an reward I'll teach you how to comprehent the knowledge written on the tablets.

data.name: Elderbug_End
data.value: Disappointed? Well I'm sorry, but once "Patch 2.1" happen, there will be a conclusion to this story. Take care of yourself...

data.name: Elderbug_Extra_Intro
data.value: Mh, but it seems like you'll have problems understanding the text and people of this world. I can teach you those skills, but since I don't want to waste time on a student which dies soon after learning, allow me to put you to a test first.

data.name: ELDERBUG_FLOWER_ACCEPT
data.value: Oh, thank you very much. I haven't received such a kind hearted gift in years. I... just can't you leave without some kind of reward. Otherwise I'd feel pretty bad. It is not much, but maybe this does help you.

data.name: ELDERBUG_FLOWER_DECLINE
data.value: No? Oh what a shame. I hope you change you mind about that decision. I'd really appreciate it.

data.name: ELDERBUG_FLOWER_REQUEST
data.value: Oh! What a beautiful flower you have there. You know, I have a weakness for flowers. The always remind of the peaceful and happy things in life. I'm sorry, if this is a bit rude, but may I have that one?

data.name: ELDERBUG_FLOWER_REREQUEST
data.value: Ah, you returned to me with this pretty flower. May I have it, this time?

data.name: Elderbug_Gain_Listening
data.value: Seems like you achieved your first steps into the world of knowledge. I stand by my word of course. Take this.

data.name: Elderbug_Met
data.value: Greetings little knight! To come so far to defeat some kind of moth god creature, admirable indeed. Curious, how I'm able to know about this? Well, let just say, the knowledge I acquired in my lifetime has allowed to me ascend even beyond the power of those "Higher Beings". Although it might seem impossible to achieve for a small creature like you, it is quite the opposite. Not looking like a big threat may allow you to sneak your way into this kingdom and learning about it without being in danger of being killed by those fools and then crushing them afterwards.

data.name: Elderbug_Normal
data.value: Taking a normal adventure, I suppose? In this case, I don't have much to offer. Take this relic, this will allow you to control the wisdom of the kingdom. Remember "Knowledge is Power".

data.name: Elderbug_Not_Enough_Lore
data.value: You're still too weak to be teached the language. Return to me once you obtained 5 different parts of knowledge.

data.name: Elderbug_Not_Listening
data.value: Want to know what I eat for breakfast? No? Then pick up the ability. Or do you really only want to talk with me and the snail shaman for the rest of your "life"?

data.name: Elderbug_Not_Reading
data.value: Don't be shy, just pick it up. Mh? Did you expect me to actual teach you how to read this language? Oh silly you. Why waste time on learning such basic skills normally, when M A G I C does the trick.

data.name: Elderbug_Pickup_Reminder
data.value: Don't rush! I know that you thirsty for the lore, but take your time and pick up my reward first. It is a bit rude ignoring a self crafted present, isn't it?

data.name: Elderbug_Randomizer
data.value: Going on a twisted adventure, I see. I'll still proceed as normal I suppose.

data.name: Elderbug_Randomizer_Not_Randomized
data.value: But it seems like that my inventory was unaffected by that. In that case, let me just give the artifact to control the obtained powers. Good luck with your Randomizer. Hehe...

data.name: Elderbug_Remind_Task
data.value: A bit forgetful aren't we? Climb down the well and return to me with a spell.

data.name: Elderbug_Task_1
data.value: Below this well, you'll find the forgotten crossroads. Fight your way through it until you reach a creature of void. They will give you a powerful tool which helps you proceeding further into this kingdom. After you obtained it, return to me and I'll teach you how to read the tablet scattered around this place.

data.name: Elderbug_Task_10
data.value: So… much… POWER! You are so close to be called a "Lore Master". Here two more scrolls to undo curses. Return to me with ALL 60 Powers obtained.

data.name: Elderbug_Task_2
data.value: Ok, for your next task, gather the knowledge written on these tablets scattered around this kingdom and acquire their power. Note, that to allow some knowledge to be used outside of their normal area, you need to fully understand everything that culture has to offer. Return to me once you obtained 5 different parts of knowledge, then I'll teach you the language to interact with the bugs of this world.

data.name: Elderbug_Task_3
data.value: Doesn't it feel much better to be able to understand what others are talking about? I think so. Anyway, some bugs may offer you valuable knowledge as well. You should consider talking to anyone that you stumble across your journey. Come back to me after your obtained 10 powers total.

data.name: Elderbug_Task_4
data.value: You slowly understand how valuable this knowledge is, do you? Take this old relic with you. It allows you to be aware of what knowledge you already understood. Return to me with a total of 15 powers.

data.name: Elderbug_Task_5
data.value: Some knowledge is placed very… unfortunate. For thoses cases, I'll allow you to use this. This scroll will allow my mind to share the knowledge about the tablet or bug which you touch on the relic. Be careful though, those scrolls can only be used once. Return to me with a total of 20 powers.

data.name: Elderbug_Task_6
data.value: Not all knowledge of this world is blessed. While I can't relieve a curse on you that easily, I at least can allow your artifact to seal unwanted powers. For this process you have to be in a calm state, on a bench maybe. Here apply this stone to your artifact. Return to me with a total of 30 powers, for even more.

data.name: Elderbug_Task_7
data.value: You are halfway done! Maybe some day I'll be able to call you "Lore Master" if you keep up that pace. Here is another scroll. This one may cleanse you from cursed knowledge you obtained if used. If there are no cursed pieces of wisdom in this kingdom, this will turn to geo instead. Anyway once you obtained 40 powers, return to me again.

data.name: Elderbug_Task_8
data.value: How does it feel? Are you afraid of what you could do? Don't waste any thought on something like that. Gain even more knowledge. Let me see 50 powers coursing through you and then I'll reward you even more.

data.name: Elderbug_Task_9
data.value: Incredible! With all this power, even Higher Beings are pitiful for someone like you, but don't stop now, you can achieve even more!. Take another scroll. Return to me with 55 powers total. You are on the path to ascend above all else!

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_BagOfMushrooms
data.value: In a search for food, you have to adapt sometimes. Although I wouldn't recommend eating random mushrooms at all.

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_BestMenderInTheWorld
data.value: There are some bugs that even I respect on a high level even though there knowledge is quite low. The Menderbugs of course! In this rotten corpse of a kingdom they still fulfill their duty with a smile. I'd recommend not hurting them by the way. Else, I'll take care of you. What does that mean? Did you know that turning your save file to steel soul mode is incredibly easy? You figure out the rest...

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_BlessingOfTheButterfly
data.value: I enjoyed fl... ehm walking through the city. Sure, the rain is annoying but there's a beautiful voice halling through the street. I sometimes wonder, what knowledge is hidden beyond this voice...

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_Camouflage
data.value: The moss creatures of greenpath liked to hide tablets pointing towards the history of this area. I'd take a closer look at the room with the moss knights.

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_CaringShell
data.value: Being alone is a terrible feeling. In those cases some of us flee into their dreams to imagine a better life. So did this girl, before the left this city. But I think the infection got her at last. Poor girl, trapped inside the depth of the wastes, all alone.

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_ConcussiveStrike
data.value: There is a big caterpillar located within the ruins of this kingdom. This is a really old creature, which probably has gathered a lot of knowledge through his lifetime.

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_DeliciousMeal
data.value: I remember a banket with a lot of eggs which was served somewhere in the city. They disappeared fairly quickly though, though not because the bugs eat them quickly, rather because they were stolen by someone. I always suspected the theft fleed into the kitchen of the Bath House. I wonder if this is true...

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_DiamondCore
data.value: There is another adventure with a familiar looking mask traveling through this kingdom. He held some kind of glowing stone. Maybe you can catch up to him in the crystal peak?

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_DiamondDash
data.value: Some cute girl climbed down this well not a long time ago. Considering that she wear a helmet and had a pickaxe, I'd guess she walked to crystal peaks.

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_DiminishingCurse
data.value: The pale king hides the secret of his actions somewhere in his palace. It would take a closer look at the walls there.

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_DramaticEntrance
data.value: Fighting with strenght? How pathetic, but it seems fitting with those weird bugs that go to the colosseum. Like this green caped guys, talking about some kind triforce that he need to collect... wait, did I mixed something up?

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_DreamBlessing
data.value: A piece of knowledge is linked to the artifact of the Moth tribe.

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_EternalSentinel
data.value: If you ignore his odor, the dung defender is pretty kind hearted and pleasant bug.

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_EternalValor
data.value: Although the Mantis of the Wastes define themselves through strength, you can't deny that they are certainly intelligent.

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_EyeOfTheWatcher
data.value: The bugs of the city always felt being watched. What fascinates me is that they always seemed so surprised once they learned that they truly have been watched. I mean, what do you expect if a bug titled "The Watcher" with a telescope is hiding inside a big tower?

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_FlowerRing
data.value: What a drama it had to be that one of the five knights had a relationship with a mantis. Did the father kill his own daughter after he found out? Who knows, that is another mystery which became forgotten in time.

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_FollowTheLight
data.value: It leaves me a bit confused that some creatures actual embraces the infection, especially the moss ones. Do you think the words the spoke are coming from Radiance herself or is the bug still talking through his own mind?

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_FriendOfTheJellyfish
data.value: If you ask me, the jellyfishs seem a bit out of place. But Monomon seemed to like studying them. Maybe somewhere she has written down her notes.

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_GiftOfUnn
data.value: From what I heard, the pilgrims where sometimes... a bit tedious to tolerate. I recall an incident where one pilgrim kicked a tablet enforcing the way of Unn, off the path. Let's just say... the pilgrim reached the city not in one piece. This happened somewhere above the Stone Sanctuary.

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_GloryOfTheWealth
data.value: Imagine walking all the way down the pilgrim's path only to be held outside of the city with a gate. The life of a pilgrims seems hard sometimes.

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_GraspOfLife
data.value: The creatures of Greenpath were caution of the White Lady. The even put a warning in front of her territory. Well, before she arrived it was there area after all.

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_GrassBombardement
data.value: The is another lonely grave within the Garden of the Queen. I always wondered who could've created that. Maybe the ghost of those who are buried there, might know the answer.

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_GreaterMind
data.value: Did you walk by the temple below? They say within this giant egg is some kind of lore hidden. I know the truth, but since this is supposed to be the end of your journey, I'll tell no more.

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_HappyFate
data.value: Some people assume that they stand above others just because of their appearance or wealth. Nothing comes close to the power knowledge offers. This woman... her ignorance made me sick. Should I...? No, stop thinking about it. Scorching the weak is not an option Elderbug... yet.

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_HotStreak
data.value: After the bugs moved through the big door into the city they needed to climb down to reach the streets. For a normal bug that seems highly dangerous. Maybe there is a warning sign or something hidden on the path?

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_Imposter
data.value: A shared mind comes with many weaknesses and strengths. Personally, I prefer being on my own.

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_Infested
data.value: Even in a society of spiders, they have someone is charge of helping birthing bug. I heard rumors that after the beast put herself to sleep, this creature moved down to from their village. You might want to take some kind of light source with you though.

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_JellyBelly
data.value: Monomon had to write down some of her research somewhere. Maybe a closer look inside her archive can't hurt.

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_JellyfishFlow
data.value: The owner of the archive Monomon was probably the most knowledgable bug in this entire kingdom. It is a shame that I didn't a chance to talk to her, before she became a dreamer.

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_JonisProtection
data.value: Calling someone a heretic for studying this blue substance is very telling if you ask me. There is a reason why the king did that. Maybe he feared the power? A secret waiting for being revealed someday.

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_LaughableThreat
data.value: Before you arrived here, there was some kind of annoying bug only talking about his 57 precepts. I know I said every bit of knowledge is important, but this case is an exception...

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_LifebloodOmen
data.value: There are many damaged walls around this kingdom. Even behind something like that, a valuable tablet could be hidden. Taking a closer look at the Cliffs would be recommended.

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_MantisStyle
data.value: The style of fighting from the mantis is impressive. Maybe I should start studying it, to expand my knowledge even more.

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_MarissasAudience
data.value: There are some posters talking about the beautiful Marissa somewhere in the city. You have to search EVERYWHERE for knowledge, even on something like that. Imagine some kind a bug hold its nail against your throat and will only let you leave if you can name the actress that is on stage today. Would you really want to be killed just because you only glanced over? I THINK NOT.

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_MaskOvercharge
data.value: Masks are truly fascinating, aren't they? You hide your true self and live on with some other identity.

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_MindblastOfUnn
data.value: This lifeblood substance even reached the top of Greenpath. I remember there being a tablet as well somewhere.

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_OneOfUs
data.value: The thorns in the wastes are not caused by the shrooms or the mantis but rather by the White Lady herself. You can see that yourself if you go to through the crossing point of those areas.

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_OverwhelmingPower
data.value: I heard rumors that the bugs of the soul sanctum have written some kind of "Record Bela". After I searched through there with the annoying spell twisted on my back, I decided to take one of their computers and "hack" the text onto it. Hm? Don't ask me how, be real you are also annoyed about the representation in EVERY SINGLE MOVIE where this is a thing. Just imagine that, roll your eyes and proceed your journey.

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_PaleLuck
data.value: The Mantis created some kind of thorn trials to practice their agility. But nowadays this area is flooded with the shrooms again. I'd be curious of what the shroom say about destroying their biom to create such trials.

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_PureSpirit
data.value: The bugs of the soul sanctum had the right idea, but hiding in the city was there biggest mistake. Only the knowledge of all of Hallownest can defeat the infection. I mean, look at me. Am I infected? Of course not!

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_QueenThorns
data.value: Knowledge of a higher being is interesting indeed. If you want to achieve your purpose who will stumble upon this knowledge anyway.

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_RelentlessSwarm
data.value: Ugh, I can't stand for the flukes invading the waterways. Even if one of them is able to "talk", there isn't much knowledge to gather.

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_ReluctantPilgrim
data.value: I always wondered where the pilgrims came from. I thought mortal bugs would lose their mind once the left the bounds of this kingdom. The start of their journey is below in the crossroads somewhere.

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_Requiem
data.value: Did you know that when I arrived I had to bury the bug that normally buries the dead? Oh how ironic.

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_ReturnToUnn
data.value: Look at the top of every room. Behind the grass and vines might be hidden knowledge. I wonder if this "Shaw" screaming creature just ignored it or didn't notice it.

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_SacredShell
data.value: The knowledge of the truth that the Pale King sealed away has to be the most precious.

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_ScrewTheRules
data.value: Right before the big door leading to this town and the kingdom is a tablet written about obeying to the rules of this kingdom. Considering that you couldn't read at the time, it couldn't stop you, I suppose.

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_ShadowForged
data.value: There is a hidden room somewhere in the white palace which holds the origin of the guards that you can find there.

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_ShiningBound
data.value: Oh the wisdom, so near the Pale King himself. I wonder if it was written by him.

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_SoulExtractEfficiency
data.value: Hidden deep in the soul sanctum there is another record. Trust your feet and ehm.. ears to find it.

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_StagAdoption
data.value: Personally, I'd not take a stag to travel through this kingdom, even if I wouldn't be able to telep.. ehm running really quickly.

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_TouchGrass
data.value: With so many thorns around I'd think twice before proceeding to walk through Greenpath. But even there you'd have to look for knowledge.

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_Tourist
data.value: Isn't it strange that the only mentioning of the Hollow Knight is at the fountain in the city? I mean, maybe this was intended to hide the sad truth behind it existence. Truly a tragedy...

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_TreasureHunter
data.value: You have to admire the courage of the relic seeker that opened some kind of "shop" within a foreign city. I prefer staying up here for my sleep, much warmer and as a bonus you also stay dry.

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_UnitedWeStand
data.value: Did you visit Leg Eater? Definitely an interesting creature isn't it. I wonder if the shrooms below whispered them something, that they became insane.

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_WeDontTalkAboutShade
data.value: Deep below the kingdom and even the palace there is a door which seals the truth of the king's actions. Before that, there might be a tablet telling about this.

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_WellFocused
data.value: On the path where you took your first steps into this kingdom, there might be some kind of tablet.

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_WisdomOfTheSage
data.value: Under the mushrooms there is a special one which some tablet talks about. Even if this tablet is hidden beyond the bounds of a normal bug of this kingdom, for someone like you this shouldn't be a problem though.

data.name: Elderbug_Tip_YouLikeJazz
data.value: The bees of the hive have isoleted themself from the rest of the kingdom. This didn't prevent me from entering their domain though. Maybe you should visit them, too.
